com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble - package com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble
Provides simplified access to Cassandra clusters, including direct support for reading and writing large files.
Connection - Interface in com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble
A single-threaded connection to a Cassandra node or cluster.
ConnectionConfig - Class in com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble
Configuration for node or cluster connections.
ConnectionConfig(String) - Constructor for class com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble.ConnectionConfig
Creates a configuration for use with the given keyspace, with default values and undefined credentials.
Consistency - Enum in com.github.cwilper.bigtrouble
Tunable consistency settings for read and write operations in the cluster.
